methods.name: getPreviousApplicationSettingsFile
methods.comment:
Searches previous Application Settings directories 
 (#getUserSettingsDirsByTime()) to find a file by the given name.   This is 
 useful for loading previous user settings, such as preferences.
 
 Note: this method will ignore any test versions of settings directories.

params.name: filename
params.comment: the name for which to seek; must be relative to a settings directory

return.comment: the most recent file matching that name found in a previous settings dir

methods.javadoc:
This is the same as {@link #getUserSettingsDirsByTime()} except that it doesn't include the 
 current installation.
methods.name: getPreviousApplicationSettingsDirsByTime
methods.comment:
This is the same as #getUserSettingsDirsByTime() except that it doesn't include the 
 current installation.

methods.javadoc:
Get the user's preferred projects directory.
@return projects directory path.
methods.name: getProjectsDirPath
methods.comment: Get the user's preferred projects directory.

methods.name: setProjectsDirPath
methods.comment:
Set the user's current projects directory path.  Value is also retained
 within user's set of preferences.

fields.javadoc: The name appended to application directories during testing
fields.name: TEST_DIRECTORY_SUFFIX
fields.comment: The name appended to application directories during testing
